Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION is followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION occurring in variants that eventually lead to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of times Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION appears in process variants with more than one rejection loop
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION compared to the frequency of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION that result in a successful Payment Handled without any rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION events that occur before Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION that directly precede Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION in cases with total Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION is missing despite Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE being present
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases where 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Ratio of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER across all variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION that occur in variants ending with Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER versus those ending with Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION in variants that include at least one re-submission by the employee after rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION that are not followed by any rejection activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION occurrences per year to detect temporal trends related to rejections
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION out of all approval-related activities (including Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases
